mapper.update: update ecs_valuecard_type set type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_money = #{typeMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, use_start_date = #{useStartDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, use_end_date = #{useEndDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_count = #{sendCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select type_id, type_name, type_money, use_start_date, use_end_date, send_count from ecs_valuecard_type
